text: Fools of Fortune is a 1990 Irish romantic drama movie directed by Pat O'Connor and was based on the 1983 novel of the same name by William Trevor. It stars Iain Glen, Sean T. McClory, Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio, Julie Christie, Amy Hastings and Michael Kitchen. == Other websites == * Category:1990 romantic drama movies Category:Irish romance movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Pat O'Connor
title: Fools of Fortune
